notifications.*.$ref.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

design.draft.minimum.description: The minimum draft of the vessel

design.draft.maximum.description: The maximum draft of the vessel

design.draft.canoe.description: The draft of the vessel without protrusions such as keel, centerboard, rudder

design.keel.angle.description: A number indicating at which angle the keel currently is (in case of a canting keel), negative to port.

design.keel.lift.description: In the case of a lifting keel, centreboard or daggerboard, the part of the keel which is extended. 0 is 'all the way up' and 1 is 'all the way down'. 0.8 would be 80% down.

navigation.courseRhumbline.crossTrackErr.description: The distance from the vessel's present position to the closest point on a line (track) between previousPoint and nextPoint. A negative number indicates that the vessel is currently to the left of this line (and thus must steer right to compensate), a positive number means the vessel is to the right of the line (steer left to compensate).

navigation.courseRhumbline.bearingTrackT.description: The bearing of a line between previousPoint and nextPoint, relative to true north.

navigation.courseRhumbline.bearingTrackM.description: The bearing of a line between previousPoint and nextPoint, relative to magnetic north.

navigation.courseRhumbline.activeRoute.e.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

navigation.courseRhumbline.activeRoute.s.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

navigation.courseRhumbline.nextPoint.dis.description: The distance in meters between the vessel's present position and the nextPoint

navigation.courseRhumbline.nextPoint.bea.description: The bearing of a line between the vessel's current position and nextPoint, relative to true north
The bearing of a line between the vessel's current position and nextPoint, relative to magnetic north

navigation.courseRhumbline.nextPoint.vel.description: The velocity component of the vessel towards the nextPoint

navigation.courseRhumbline.nextPoint.tim.description: Time in seconds to reach nextPoint's perpendicular) with current speed & direction

navigation.courseRhumbline.previousPoint.description: The distance in meters between previousPoint and the vessel's present position

navigation.courseGreatCircle.crossTrackE.description: The distance from the vessel's present position to the closest point on a line (track) between previousPoint and nextPoint. A negative number indicates that the vessel is currently to the left of this line (and thus must steer right to compensate), a positive number means the vessel is to the right of the line (steer left to compensate).

navigation.courseGreatCircle.bearingTrac.description: The bearing of a line between previousPoint and nextPoint, relative to true north.
The bearing of a line between previousPoint and nextPoint, relative to magnetic north.

navigation.courseGreatCircle.activeRoute.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.
ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

navigation.courseGreatCircle.nextPoint.d.description: The distance in meters between the vessel's present position and the nextPoint

navigation.courseGreatCircle.nextPoint.b.description: The bearing of a line between the vessel's current position and nextPoint, relative to true north
The bearing of a line between the vessel's current position and nextPoint, relative to magnetic north

navigation.courseGreatCircle.nextPoint.v.description: The velocity component of the vessel towards the nextPoint

navigation.courseGreatCircle.nextPoint.t.description: Time in seconds to reach nextPoint's perpendicular) with current speed & direction

navigation.courseGreatCircle.previousPoi.description: The distance in meters between previousPoint and the vessel's present position

navigation.racing.distanceStartline.description: The current distance to the start line

navigation.racing.timePortDown.description: Time to arrive at the start line on port, turning downwind

navigation.racing.timePortUp.description: Time to arrive at the start line on port, turning upwind

navigation.racing.timeStbdDown.description: Time to arrive at the start line on starboard, turning downwind

navigation.racing.timeStbdUp.description: Time to arrive at the start line on starboard, turning upwind

navigation.racing.distanceLayline.description: The current distance to the layline

navigation.magneticVariation.description: The magnetic variation (declination) at the current position

navigation.magneticVariationAgeOfService.description: Seconds since the 1st Jan 1970 that the variation calculation was made

navigation.destination.eta.$ref.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

navigation.headingMagnetic.description: Current magnetic heading of the vessels

navigation.headingTrue.description: The current true heading of the vessel

navigation.attitude.roll.description: Vessel roll, +ve is list to starboard

navigation.attitude.yaw.description: Yaw, +ve is heading change to starboard

navigation.anchor.maxRadius.description: Radius of anchor alarm boundary. The distance from anchor to the center of the boat

electrical.batteries.*.voltage.meta.faul.description: Upper fault limit of battery voltage - BMS may disconnect battery
Lower fault limit of battery voltage - BMS may disconnect battery

electrical.batteries.*.current.meta.faul.description: Upper fault limit of battery current - BMS may disconnect battery
Lower fault limit of battery current - BMS may disconnect battery

electrical.batteries.*.temperature.fault.description: Upper fault limit of temperature - device may disable
Lower fault limit of temperature - device may disable

electrical.batteries.*.temperature.limit.description: Operational minimum temperature limit for battery discharge, in degrees Celsius
Operational maximum temperature limit for battery discharge, in degrees Celsius
Operational minimum temperature limit for battery recharging, in degrees Celsius
Operational maximum temperature limit for battery recharging, in degrees Celsius

electrical.batteries.*.meta.dateInstalle.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

electrical.batteries.*.capacity.nominal.description: The capacity of battery as specified by the manufacturer

electrical.batteries.*.capacity.actual.description: The measured capacity of battery. This may change over time and will likely deviate from the nominal capacity.

electrical.batteries.*.capacity.discharg.description: Minimum capacity to be left in the battery while discharging
Cumulative discharge since battery was last full

electrical.batteries.*.capacity.timeRema.description: Time to discharge to discharge limit at current rate

electrical.batteries.*.lifetimeDischarge.description: Cumulative charge discharged from battery over operational lifetime of battery

electrical.batteries.*.lifetimeRecharge.description: Cumulative charge recharged into battery over operational lifetime of battery

electrical.inverters.*.meta.dateInstalle.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

electrical.inverters.*.dc.voltage.meta.f.description: Upper fault limit of battery voltage - BMS may disconnect battery
Lower fault limit of battery voltage - BMS may disconnect battery

electrical.inverters.*.dc.current.meta.f.description: Upper fault limit of battery current - BMS may disconnect battery
Lower fault limit of battery current - BMS may disconnect battery

electrical.inverters.*.dc.temperature.fa.description: Upper fault limit of temperature - device may disable
Lower fault limit of temperature - device may disable

electrical.inverters.*.ac.lineNeutralVol.description: RMS voltage measured between phase and neutral.

electrical.chargers.*.voltage.meta.fault.description: Upper fault limit of battery voltage - BMS may disconnect battery
Lower fault limit of battery voltage - BMS may disconnect battery

electrical.chargers.*.current.meta.fault.description: Upper fault limit of battery current - BMS may disconnect battery
Lower fault limit of battery current - BMS may disconnect battery

electrical.chargers.*.temperature.faultU.description: Upper fault limit of temperature - device may disable

electrical.chargers.*.temperature.faultL.description: Lower fault limit of temperature - device may disable

electrical.chargers.*.meta.dateInstalled.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

electrical.ac.*.meta.dateInstalled.$ref.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

electrical.ac.*.phase.*.lineNeutralVolta.description: RMS voltage measured between phase and neutral.

environment.outside.apparentWindChillTem.description: Current outside apparent wind chill temperature

environment.outside.theoreticalWindChill.description: Current outside theoretical wind chill temperature

environment.depth.transducerToKeel.description: Depth from the transducer to the bottom of the keel

environment.depth.surfaceToTransducer.description: Depth transducer is below the water

environment.current.drift.description: The speed component of the water current vector

environment.current.setTrue.description: The direction component of the water current vector referenced to true (geographic) north

environment.current.setMagnetic.description: The direction component of the water current vector referenced to magnetic north

environment.tide.timeLow.$ref.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

environment.tide.timeHigh.$ref.description: ISO-8601 (UTC) string representing date and time.

environment.heave.description: Vertical movement of the vessel due to waves

environment.wind.angleApparent.description: Apparent wind angle, negative to port

environment.wind.angleTrueGround.description: True wind angle based on speed over ground, negative to port

environment.wind.angleTrueWater.description: True wind angle based on speed through water, negative to port

environment.wind.directionChangeAlarm.description: The angle the wind needs to shift to raise an alarm

environment.wind.directionTrue.description: The wind direction relative to true north

environment.wind.directionMagnetic.description: The wind direction relative to magnetic north

environment.wind.speedTrue.description: Wind speed over water (as calculated from speedApparent and vessel's speed through water)

environment.wind.speedOverGround.description: Wind speed over ground (as calculated from speedApparent and vessel's speed over ground)

performance.polarSpeed.description: The current polar speed based on current polar diagram, trueWindSpeed and truewindAngle.

performance.polarSpeedRatio.description: The ratio of current speed through water to the polar speed.

performance.velocityMadeGood.description: The current velocity made good derived from the speed through water and appearant wind angle. A positive value is heading to upwind, negative to downwind.

performance.velocityMadeGoodToWaypoint.description: The current velocity made good to the next waypoint derived from the speedOverGround, courseOverGround.

performance.beatAngle.description: The true wind beat angle for the best velocity made good based on current current polar diagram and trueWindSpeed.

performance.beatAngleVelocityMadeGood.description: The velocity made good for the beat angle.

performance.beatAngleTargetSpeed.description: The target speed for the beat angle.

performance.gybeAngle.description: The true wind gybe angle for the best velocity made good downwind based on current polar diagram and trueWindSpeed.

performance.gybeAngleVelocityMadeGood.description: The velocity made good for the gybe angle

performance.gybeAngleTargetSpeed.description: The target speed for the gybe angle.

performance.targetAngle.description: The true wind gybe or beat angle for the best velocity made good downwind or upwind based on current polar diagram and trueWindSpeed.

performance.targetSpeed.description: The target speed for the beat angle or gybe angle, which ever is applicable.

propulsion.*.transmission.gearRatio.description: Gear ratio, Engine rotations per propeller shaft rotation

propulsion.*.drive.thrustAngle.description: Current thrust angle for steerable drives, +ve is thrust to Starboard

propulsion.*.drive.propeller.pitch.description: Current pitch of propeller, the distance the propeller ideally would advance during one revolution of the propeller

propulsion.*.drive.propeller.slip.description: Propeller slip, the ratio between propeller pitch and actual distance travelled

propulsion.*.fuel.used.description: Used fuel since last reset. Resetting is at user discretion

resources.routes.*.distance.description: Total distance from start to end

sails.inventory.*.area.description: The total area of this sail in square meters

sails.inventory.*.minimumWind.description: The minimum wind speed this sail can be used with

sails.inventory.*.maximumWind.description: The maximum wind speed this sail can be used with

sails.area.total.description: The total area of all sails on the vessel

sails.area.active.description: The total area of the sails currently in use on the vessel

steering.rudderAngle.description: Current rudder angle, +ve is rudder to Starboard

steering.rudderAngleTarget.description: The angle the rudder should move to, +ve is rudder to Starboard

steering.autopilot.targetHeadingNorth.description: Target heading for autopilot, relative to true North

steering.autopilot.targetHeadingMagnetic.description: Target heading for autopilot, relative to magnetic North

steering.autopilot.deadZone.description: Dead zone to ignore for rudder corrections

steering.autopilot.backlash.description: Slack in the rudder drive mechanism

steering.autopilot.maxDriveCurrent.description: Maximum current to use to drive servo

steering.autopilot.portLock.description: Position of servo on port lock

steering.autopilot.starboardLock.description: Position of servo on starboard lock
